item.title: Sonarqube recovery from failed
item.description: The volumen prefere to EBS can speed up the scanning. Adjust the resources request and limit 1resources: 2 limits: 3 cpu: '1' 4 memory: 8Gi 5 requests: 6 cpu: 400m 7 memory: 4Gi Change the securityContext to debug the pod and install some tools to check 1securityContext: 2 runAsUser: 0 3 runAsGroup: 0 Mount the sonar.properties to specific the java launch parameters the mount and volumes 1volumes: 2 - name: sonarqube-config 3 configMap: 4 name: sonarqube-sonarqube-config 5 defaultMode: 420 6volumeMounts: 7- name: sonarqube-config 8 mountPath: /opt/sonarqube/conf the configmap 1apiVersion: v1 2kind: ConfigMap 3metadata: 4 name: sonarqube-sonarqube-config 5 namespace: sonarqube 6data: 7 sonar.
